main event: A metallic gray object was observed passing over Riga, USSR at high speed in 1958.
interesting points: The object arrived from the southeast in an oblique flying position and seemed to slow down as it approached the observation point.
The object hovered for a moment before flying off towards the southwest.
The witness immediately went to the spot where the object was last seen but could find no trace of it.
There was an air-raid drill happening at the time of the sighting, but no public notations were made in the newspaper or radio.
The witness was curious about the UFO and asked questions after seeing it.
